password_input.title: Device Protection
password_input.subtitle: Please provide a password if device protection is enabled
password_input.instructions: Please check if your whatwatt Go has "Device Protection" enabled. You can do this by checking the device settings in the web-UI. If enabled, enter the password below. If disabled, leave the field empty. Afterward, please press "Continue" to proceed with the pairing
password_input.error_message: An error occurred. Please try again.

repair_input.title: Repair device
repair_input.subtitle: Repair a device if it is not working as expected
repair_input.instructions: Device repair can be used to update the password used for "Device Protection" and to reinitialize the device capabilities based on what your smart meter supports. If your whatwatt Go has "Device Protection" enabled, enter the password below. If disabled, leave the field empty. The password will be tested during the repair process.
